original: Asami is a student at Kita Junior High School in Japan.

original: Her school has a sister school, ABC Junior High School, in Canada.

original: Both schools have student exchange program.

original: In the program, some students at Kita Junior High School visit ABC Junior High School every fall, and some students at ABC Junior High School visit Kita Junior High School every spring.
